CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 22, 1964, pg. 8, reads: "Happy Birthday Robin! - Little Robin Bullard celebrated her sixth birthday on Feb. 1 at a party given at the home of her grandmother, Mrs. Margaret Bullard, 2801 Bedford Ave. Robin, standing in front of her birthday cake, with a party hat, is surrounded by some of her friends attending the interracial party. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Boys and girls, possibly including Michael Thompson, Renay Wilson, Rhonda Wilson, Sharon Fowler, Shirley Fowler, and Mark Thompson gathered around Robin Bullard wearing birthday hat, posed behind her sixth birthday cake, in home of her grandmother, Margaret Bullard, 2801 Bedford Avenue
